fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Use 1 bee and sting a player and they will be roleblocked and their attributes will be roleblocked.
- Use 2 bees, investigate 3 players and find their roles.
- Use 3 bees and deal a powerful attack to 2 players.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - You will earn 1 bee every night. You can use 3 abilities per night.
